definitions.definition: a problem or temporary failure when you are on the way to achieving something

examples.text: There were good reasons for the team's first-round stumble against Los Angeles.

definitions.definition: an act of falling or almost falling, especially because you hit your foot against something

examples.text: After a slight stumble backwards, he regained his balance.

definitions.definition: a mistake that causes you to stop when you are reading, speaking or playing music
